name: UIPrintFormatter
desc: An abstract base class for print formatters, which are objects that lay out custom printable content that can cross page boundaries.

items.name: var perPageContentInsets: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The margins for each printed page.

items.name: var maximumContentHeight: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum height of the content area.

items.name: var maximumContentWidth: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum width of the content area.

items.name: var startPage: Int
items.desc: The index of the first page that the print formatter lays out.

items.name: var pageCount: Int
items.desc: The number of pages to print.

items.name: func draw(in: CGRect, forPageAt: Int)
items.desc: Draws the portion of a print formatterâ€™s content for the specified area of the specified page.

items.name: func rectForPage(at: Int) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the area that encloses a specified page of content.

items.name: func removeFromPrintPageRenderer()
items.desc: Removes the print formatter from the page renderer.

items.name: var printPageRenderer: UIPrintPageRenderer?
items.desc: Returns the page renderer for the print formatter.
